Original meaning 本义: Meaning a cloth to carry an infant on the back; to tie; to bind

綳字的基本解释

均见“绷”。

綳字的汉语字典释义

[①]［bēng］
［《集韻》悲萌切，平耕，幫。］
“绷1”的繁体字。亦作“繃1”。
(1)束缚；捆绑。
(2)包裹婴儿的布。亦指用布裹束婴儿。
(3)张紧；拉紧。
(4)指四周有边框，当中绷紧绳、藤、布帛等的器物。
(5)谓物体猛然弹起。
(6)缝纫方法。稀疏地缝住或用针别上。
(7)勉强支持；硬撑。
(8)谓骗取财物。
[②]［běng］
“绷2”的繁体字。
(1)把笑容收起，使面部表情严肃。
(2)用强力支撑。
[③]［bèng］
“绷3”的繁体字。
(1)用在“硬、直、亮”一类形容词的前面，表示程度深。
(2)裂开。参见“綳3瓷”。

綳字的康熙字典解释

【未集中】【糸字部】　綳； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页928第02
【集韻】繃，或作綳。詳繃字註。

綳字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
綳字的起名意思

暂无。

綳
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［bēng］
["Ji Yun" is sad and cute, flat plowing, helping. ]
Traditional Chinese characters for "Bang 1". Also known as "stretch 1".
(1) Restraint; binding.
(2) The cloth that wraps the baby. Also refers to wrapping a baby in cloth.
(3) Tension; Tension.
(4) Refers to the utensils with a frame around it, among which are tensioned ropes, vines, cloth and silk.
(5) It is said that the object bounces up suddenly.
(6) Sewing method. Sew it sparsely or pin it on.
(7) Reluctantly support; hard support.
(8) Said to defraud property.
[②]［běng］
Traditional Chinese characters for "Bang 2".
(1) Put away the smile and make the facial expression serious.
(2) Use strong support.
[③]［bèng］
Traditional characters for "Bang 3".
(1) Used in front of adjectives such as "hard, straight, and bright" to indicate a deep degree.
(2) Cracking. See "Zi 3 Porcelain".
綳
